short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record functional tests (Cases) on any site and export directly to the Cursion Platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Cursion Chrome extension lets you quickly record functional tests on any site and directly export to the Cursion Platform.
